H0.text: A bird is a warm-blooded organism that nurses its young.

H1.text: An insect is a warm-blooded organism that nurses its young.

H2.text: A mammal is a warm-blooded organism that nurses its young.

H3.text: A reptile is a warm-blooded organism that nurses its young.

A5.text: The mammary glands of mammals are specialised to produce milk, the primary source of nutrition for newborns.
